description:
Daily Schedule:

9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Responsibilities:
  • Drive marketing programs to build brand awareness and increase adoption of client products.
  • Develop and manage online campaigns, including email marketing and website placements.
  • Create and optimize marketing collateral and sales tools for direct sales teams and events.
  • Collaborate with designers to create compelling content for client websites.
  • Analyze campaign performance metrics and identify opportunities for improvement.
  • Work cross-functionally to prioritize and manage marketing initiatives.
Must-Haves:
  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in marketing, with a focus on campaign management and brand development.
  • Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Strong analytical skills and experience with performance metrics.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Nice-to-Haves:
  • Experience in the technology or payments industry.
  • Familiarity with client-specific platforms and tools.
  • Advanced proficiency in digital marketing strategies and tools.
benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance
